indicator_name: Proportion of government recurrent and capital spending to sectors that disproportionately benefit women, the poor and vulnerable groups
target_name: Create sound policy frameworks at the national, regional and international levels, based on pro-poor and gender-sensitive development strategies, to support accelerated investment in poverty eradication actions
other_info: This, or part of this, indicator is awaiting the development of internationally established methodology and standards (classified by the UN as tier 3).
graph_title: Proportion of government recurrent and capital spending to sectors that disproportionately benefit women, the poor and vulnerable groups
